argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isms.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` K ) |
| 2 |  | isms.x | |- X = ( Base ` K ) |
| 3 |  | isms.d | |- D = ( ( dist ` K ) |` ( X X. X ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_isms2 | |- ( K e. MetSp <-> ( D e. ( Met ` X ) /\ J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simprbi | |- ( K e. MetSp -> J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) |
